item.title: MacBook安装Linux系统键盘映射
item.author: Jacob
item.description: 键盘映射 实现Supper 与 Control 键互换 打开下面的文件 1 sudo vi usr/share/X11/xkb/symbols/pc 编辑映射 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 key <LCTL> { [ Super_L ] }; key <LWIN> { [ Control_L ] }; ... key <RCTL> { [ Super_R ] }; key <RWIN> { [ Control_R ] };
